types1:Item.types1:Name: Process_API08_NewBusinessPartner
types1:Item.types1:Description: Creates Business Partners in SAP based on Input files generated by the mappings m_api-8_BulkLoad_JDBC --OR-- m_api-8_BulkLoad_FlatFile

process.name: Process_API08_NewBusinessPartner
process.description: Creates Business Partners in SAP based on Input files generated by the mappings m_api-8_BulkLoad_JDBC --OR-- m_api-8_BulkLoad_FlatFile

operation.expression: <root xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> {for $x in $temp.tmp_IdentityRegister return if(not(util:isNull($x/IdCode/text()))) then ( <to_BusinessPartnerTax> <results m:isArray="true"> <BPTaxType>{util:iif($x/IdType/text()='INC','SG3',util:iif($x/IdType/text()='VAT','SG1',''))}</BPTaxType> <BPTaxNumber>{$x/IdCode/text()}</BPTaxNumber> </results> </to_BusinessPartnerTax> ) else () } </root>

<BusinessPartner xmlns:m="urn:informatica:ae:xquery:json2xml:meta-data"> <AuthorizationGroup>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/AuthorizationGroup } </AuthorizationGroup> <BusinessPartnerCategory>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/BusinessPartnerCategory }</BusinessPartnerCategory> <BusinessPartner>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/BusinessPartner} </BusinessPartner> <Language>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/Language} </Language> <CorrespondenceLanguage>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/Language}</CorrespondenceLanguage> <BusinessPartnerGrouping>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/BusinessPartnerGrouping }</BusinessPartnerGrouping> <FirstName>{$temp.tmp_FirstName_Transformed }</FirstName> <LastName>{ $temp.tmp_LastName_Transformed }</LastName> <OrganizationBPName1>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/OrganizationBPName1 }</OrganizationBPName1> <OrganizationBPName2>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/OrganizationBPName2 }</OrganizationBPName2> <SearchTerm1>{$temp.tmp_SearchTerm }</SearchTerm1> <BusinessPartnerIDByExtSystem>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/BusinessPartnerIDByExtSystem }</BusinessPartnerIDByExtSystem> <!-- Removed for CF Migration --> {$temp.tmp_BusinessPartnerTax_PO/element() }
<!--{ if(not(util:isNull($temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/AddrNr))) --> <!--then (--> <to_BusinessPartnerAddress> <results m:isArray="true"> <CityName>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/CityName}</CityName> <PostalCode>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/PostalCode} </PostalCode> <Language>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/Language} </Language> <Country>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/Country}</Country> <StreetPrefixName>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/address } </StreetPrefixName> <AdditionalStreetPrefixName>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/address2 }</AdditionalStreetPrefixName> <StreetName>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/address3 }</StreetName> <StreetSuffixName>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/address4 }</StreetSuffixName> <AdditionalStreetSuffixName>{$temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/address5 }</AdditionalStreetSuffixName> { $temp.tmp_EmailAddress_BP_PO/element() } <to_AddressUsage> <results m:isArray="true"> <AddressUsage>XXDEFAULT</AddressUsage> <ValidityEndDate>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidityEndDate> </results> </to_AddressUsage> </results> </to_BusinessPartnerAddress>
<!-- ) else ()} -->
<!-- { if(not(util:isNull($temp.tmp_fileContent[1]/AddrNr))) --> <!-- then ( --> <to_BusinessPartnerRole> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>FLCU00</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>UDM000</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>UKM000</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> <results> <BusinessPartnerRole>FLCU01</BusinessPartnerRole> <ValidFrom>{fn:current-dateTime()}</ValidFrom> <ValidTo>{date:toDate('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')}</ValidTo> </results> </to_BusinessPartnerRole> <!-- ) else ()} --> </BusinessPartner>
